name: Bats'14-'19
description:
This game is about a bat using echolocation to figure its way out. It transmits sound waves to know the location of the obstacles in its way in a dark forest.

--

[How To Play]

-Help the bat fly by pressing the keys "A" for Left and "D" for Right.
-Left click to transmit high pitched sounds to identify what's in front of you.
-Once the sound hit something, it will be visible for 3 seconds, that will give you
enough time to dodge it and move to another direction.
-Your bat has only 3 lives, everytime you hit an object, it will be deducted by one.
-Your Score is your time alive in the game, so keep your eyes open and your senses sharp
because the higher the time, the faster the game will be and there will be more objects spawning randomly.

Enjoy!~

--

The game was created in Global Game Jam 2018

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/bats-14-19
